meaningMnemonic: The <radical>moon</radical> is <radical>easy</radical> tonight, so you decide to cut it open. But, the moon wasn't the moon, it was your big, pale, round tummy. You just cut it open, and now you can see your <kanji>intestines</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: All over the world, people are cutting their bellies open, because they think its an easy moon (versus a normal moon, or hard moon, presumably). This is because they have fallen victim to a spell by Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう).
